channel.title: What is this and how can i solve this problem(please look)
channel.description:
I got this error when compiling saying.....
Code: client.java:24821: illegal start of expression public int GetRunAnim(int id) ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
I tried to compare with the same source with any editing but just cannot find anything out of place.Ever i deleted a thing, this starter happening.If you have a clue of what this error means please tell me and post here.Thank you and bye.

public int GetRunAnim(int id) { if(id == 4151) // whip { return 1661; } if(id == 8447) // cat toy { return 1661; } if(id == 6818) // bow-sword { return 744; } if(id == 4734 || id == 837) // karils x bow { return 2077; } if(id == 4153) // maul { return 1664; } if(id == 1419) // scythe { return 1664; } if(id == 7449) // noobsmasher { return 1664; } else { return 0x338; } }
